output.sentences: My husband finally finished the renovations on the kitchen.
He installed new handles on all the cabinets.
This gave a whole new look to the drawers.
It almost changed the look of the entire kitchen.
When I asked about the microwave, he just shrugged his shoulders and said "eventually'' and cracked open another beer.
